You are here: [Welcome Home] > [HtmlReference HTML Reference] > [CharacterEntities Character entities] > [CharacterEntitiesR R] > &rarrtl;

== Value ==

There are 2 variations of this entity:

  * `&Rarrtl;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/2916/index.htm U+02916].
  * `&rarrtl;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/21a3/index.htm U+021A3].
